ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Four: Phoenix Unbound
ComicInfo.Series: Doc Savage: The Ring of Fire
ComicInfo.Summary:
John Sunlight wants to light up the Ring of Fire, causing havoc and destruction all along the West Coast. Can Doc Savage and Amelia Earhart stop him in time? Catch the apocalyptic climax of Avallone and Acostaâ€™s DOC SAVAGE: RING OF FIRE!
